definition[0]: the low sound made by a heavy object hitting something else
example[0]: His head hit the floor with a sickening thud.
example[1]: There was a dull thud as the box hit the floor.
definition[1]: to hit something with a low sound
example[2]: The stone thudded to the ground.
example[3]: waves thudding against the side of the ship
definition[2]: to walk or run with your feet making a heavy sound as they touch the ground
example[4]: A horse thudded over the frozen grass.
definition[3]: if your heart thuds, it beats strongly because you are excited or frightened
example[5]: Peter was aware of his heart thudding in his chest.
